official_title: A bill to amend the Disaster Relief Act of 1974 to direct the President to determine the Federal contribution for grants to repair and restore damaged facilities based on the facts of each major disaster, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Disaster Relief Act of 1974 to direct the President to determine the Federal contribution to State and local governments for disaster relief. Describes procedures by which the President shall make such determinations. Authorizes appropriations.
